titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the trade relationship between the United States and India.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/17/2008--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with India. Urges both countries to continue to pursue multilateral negotiations for a reduction in tariffs, subsidies, and other non-tariff barriers to trade with developed and developing countries.
